§ scroll-protocol

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

The **scroll-protocol** is a [[small-net]] a [[human-legible]] response-request style protocol that also supports streaming.

THe **scroll-protocol** was inspired by the [[gemini-protocol]] and the **gopher+** extension to the [[gopher-protocol]].

The **scroll-protocol** is considered a [[small-net]] protocol.

The **scroll-protocol** has a closely associated [[data-format]] — the [[scrolltext-format]].

§§ URL Scheme

The URL and URI scheme for the **scroll-protocol** is “**scroll**”.
As in:

	scroll:/((/))example.com/

§§ TCP Port

The default [[tcp-port]] for the **scroll-protocol** is: **5699**.

§§ More Information

More information about the **scroll-protocol** can be found at:

• gemini://scrollprotocol.us.to/
• gemini://scrollprotocol.us.to/spec.scroll
